snippet: Timothy Jandovitz, a former health care analyst, is scheduled to be the prosecution’s first witness at the insider trading trial of the former SAC manager Mathew Martoma.
abstract: Timothy Jandovitz, a former health care analyst, is scheduled to be the prosecution’s first witness at the insider trading trial of the former SAC manager Mathew Martoma.

headline.main: First Witness in Martoma Trial Took Detour to Waffle Business
